## InflationGovernor interface

Network Inflation (see [proposed schedule](https://docs.solana.com/inflation/inflation_schedule)<!-- -->)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface InflationGovernor 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [foundation](./web3.js.inflationgovernor.foundation.md) | number | The percentage of total inflation allocated to the foundation. |
|  [foundationTerm](./web3.js.inflationgovernor.foundationterm.md) | number | The duration of foundation pool inflation in years. |
|  [initial](./web3.js.inflationgovernor.initial.md) | number | The initial inflation percentage from time 0. |
|  [taper](./web3.js.inflationgovernor.taper.md) | number | The rate per year at which inflation is lowered. |
|  [terminal](./web3.js.inflationgovernor.terminal.md) | number | The terminal inflation percentage. |
